title: CONSOLIDATED BALANCE SHEETS - USD ($)$ in Millions

Current assets:.label: Cash and cash equivalents
Current assets:.definition: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

Current assets:.label: Marketable securities
Current assets:.definition: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

Current assets:.label: Accounts receivable, net
Current assets:.definition: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

Current assets:.label: Inventories
Current assets:.definition: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

Current assets:.label: Other current assets
Current assets:.definition: Amount of current assets classified as other.

Current assets:.label: Total current assets
Current assets:.definition: Amount of asset recognized for present right to economic benefit, classified as current.

Non-current assets:.label: Property, plant and equipment, net
Non-current assets:.definition: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

Non-current assets:.label: Operating lease right-of-use assets
Non-current assets:.definition: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

Non-current assets:.label: Goodwill
Non-current assets:.definition: Amount, after accumulated impairment loss, of asset representing future economic benefit arising from other asset acquired in business combination or from joint venture formation or both, that is not individually identified and separately recognized.

Non-current assets:.label: Intangible assets, net
Non-current assets:.definition: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

Non-current assets:.label: Equity method investments (see Note 5)
Non-current assets:.definition: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

Non-current assets:.label: Other non-current assets
Non-current assets:.definition: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

Non-current assets:.label: Total non-current assets
Non-current assets:.definition: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Non-current assets:.label: Total assets
Non-current assets:.definition: Amount of asset recognized for present right to economic benefit.

Current liabilities:.label: Short-term debt
Current liabilities:.definition: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Current liabilities:.label: Trade accounts payable (see Note 17)
Current liabilities:.definition: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

Current liabilities:.label: Operating lease obligations
Current liabilities:.definition: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

Current liabilities:.label: Accrued expenses and other liabilities
Current liabilities:.definition: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

Current liabilities:.label: Income taxes
Current liabilities:.definition: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

Current liabilities:.label: Total current liabilities
Current liabilities:.definition: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

Non-current liabilities:.label: Long-term debt
Non-current liabilities:.definition: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as noncurrent. Excludes lease obligation.

Non-current liabilities:.label: Operating lease obligations
Non-current liabilities:.definition: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

Non-current liabilities:.label: Deferred income taxes
Non-current liabilities:.definition: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

Non-current liabilities:.label: Accrued litigation obligations
Non-current liabilities:.definition: Carrying amount of estimated litigation liability for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Non-current liabilities:.label: Other non-current liabilities
Non-current liabilities:.definition: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Non-current liabilities:.label: Total non-current liabilities
Non-current liabilities:.definition: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Non-current liabilities:.label: Total liabilities
Non-current liabilities:.definition: Amount of liability recognized for present obligation requiring transfer or otherwise providing economic benefit to others.

Non-current liabilities:.label: Redeemable non-controlling interests
Non-current liabilities:.definition: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

Equity:.label: Preferred stock $.01 par value; authorized 32 million shares, none issued
Equity:.definition: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

Equity:.label: Common stock $.01 par value; authorized 3.2 billion shares; issued 1,172,513,618 at August 31, 2024 and August 31, 2023
Equity:.definition: Value of common shares held by shareholders. Excludes common shares repurchased and held as treasury shares.

Equity:.label: Paid-in capital
Equity:.definition: Amount of excess of issue price over par or stated value of stock and from other transaction involving stock or stockholder. Includes, but is not limited to, additional paid-in capital (APIC) for common and preferred stock.

Equity:.label: Accumulated other comprehensive loss
Equity:.definition: Amount, after tax, of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transaction and other event and circumstance from nonowner source.

Equity:.label: Treasury stock, at cost; 308,513,185 shares at August 31, 2024 and 308,839,832 shares at August 31, 2023
Equity:.definition: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

Equity:.label: Total Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. shareholders’ equity
Equity:.definition: Amount of equity (deficit) attributable to parent. Excludes temporary equity and equity attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Equity:.label: Non-controlling interests
Equity:.definition: Amount of equity (deficit) attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes temporary equity.

Equity:.label: Total equity
Equity:.definition: Amount of equity (deficit) attributable to parent and noncontrolling interest. Excludes temporary equity.

Equity:.label: Total liabilities, redeemable non-controlling interests and equity
Equity:.definition: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.
